com.github.ctrimble.chlorine.classloader
Interface ChlorineSecureClassDefiner

All Superinterfaces:
ChlorineClassDefiner
All Known Implementing Classes:
ChlorineSecureClassLoader, ChlorineURLClassLoader
public interface ChlorineSecureClassDefiner
extends ChlorineClassDefiner

Chlorine specific replacements for the defineClass methods provided by java.security.SecureClassLoader.

Author:
Christian Trimble
